document_data.mainbody:
Chancereene Chaserperi was the wife of Faereldan Chaserperi, and the matriarch of the Chaserperi clan of mages, in the late mid-14 century DR.
She lived with her husband in a small manor on Skellin Street, Athkatla. Their home had a walled garden on the back.
As of the , she had taken over her husbands responsibilities as clan patriarch and was looking for a successor amongst the clans younger generation.
She used to spar verbally with her husband as his memory began to fail, she became increasingly supportive, writing down names and sketching faces on his hand before meetings.
